name: CreateWebhook
description:
Create a new webhook for a Trello token.

Use this tool to set up a new webhook associated with a specific Trello token. This is useful for receiving real-time updates or notifications related to Trello boards or cards linked to the token.

parameters.name: webhook_callback_url
parameters.description: The URL where the webhook will POST updates. Ensure this is a valid and reachable URL for receiving notifications.

value_schema.description: The URL that the webhook should POST information to.

parameters.name: object_id_for_webhook
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello object (like a board or card) for which to create a webhook.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to create a webhook on.

parameters.name: webhook_description
parameters.description: A brief description displayed when retrieving webhook information.

value_schema.description: A description to be displayed when retrieving information about the webhook.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description to be displayed when retrieving information about the webhook.

value_schema.description: A description to be displayed when retrieving information about the webhook.

parameters.name: callbackURL
parameters.description: The URL that the webhook should POST information to.

value_schema.description: The URL that the webhook should POST information to.

parameters.name: idModel
parameters.description: ID of the object to create a webhook on.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to create a webhook on.
